name: Uta
text: Activate: Main Once Per Turn (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area; Up to 1 of your Characters without effects gains +2000 power during this turn.)

effect.text: You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area; Up to 1 of your Characters without effects gains +2000 power during this turn.
targets: Up to 1 of your Characters without effects
